	<xf:button href="{{ link('threads/featured', $thread) }}" class="button--link" overlay="true">

			{{ phrase('fs_latest_unfeatured') }}
			<xf:else />
			{{ phrase('fs_latest_featured') }}
		</xf:if>
	</xf:button>
